solution_line_template: You first need to know the total weight of the vegetables, so you add each quantity: {carrots_kg} + {zucchini_kg} + {broccoli_kg} = <<{carrots_kg}+{zucchini_kg}+{broccoli_kg}={total_kg}>>{total_kg} kg
Then you have to find half of {total_kg}: {total_kg}/{sold_fraction} = <<{total_kg}/{sold_fraction}={sold_kg}>>{sold_kg} kg.
So, he sold {sold_kg} kg of vegetables.
